name: Ludum Dare 46- Keep Sweep
description:
Instructions

Arrow keys to move.
Hold space to aim, release to shoot.
1 2 3  to buy upgrades.
Q  to repair.

Q.

  

Repairing costs 20 material for each HP missing - and you cannot repair less than fully so don't take too much damage or it might get too expensive!

1.

 

Toughness upgrades increase max hp and the damage dealt with stomp.

2. 

Leg upgrades increase the move speed and the frequency of stomps.

3.

Shooting upgrades increases the damage and speed of the projectile. 

This game was made by two guys over 72 hours as part of the Ludum Dare game jam, with the theme "Keep it alive".
